1.content:
I was in holiday in Spain for 7 weeks.
I went to the same house Maisie went to. Course I didn't know then. By the way, name's Joey.
Joey Graceffa
1.title: Start

choices: I see a girl sat in a tree
11.content:
I went down to the pool.
My sister Nicole followed me.
11.title: Continue

111.content:
I stared at her confused.
The girl looked at me.
111.title: I see a girl sat in a tree

1111.content:
Nicole: Joey?
Joey: What?
Nicole: What are you staring at?
1111.title: Continue

choices: I saw a girl looking at me (Maisie)
I see a boy looking at me (Peter)
112.title: Continue

12.content:
I was asleep in the same room.
Maisie: It's been a while since I've been here.
Peter: (whispers) Sh...
12.title: That night

121.content:
I turned over.
Maisie: (nods to Peter)
Peter: (leaves a note)
121.title: Continue

1211.content: So, shall we switch POVs to someone else? If so, WHO?
1211.title: POV Switch?

choices: We decide to go to Spain.
12111.content: Me and Peter were hanging out in neverland.
12111.title: Maisie

choices: Jump back to Peter and Maisie
121111.content:
Then, a rather huge shooting star streaked through the Neverland sky. IN THE MIDDLE OF THE DAY. The meteorite then crashed into the side of a nearby mountain, and TUNNELED THROUGH IT, finally embeding itself into the plain below, where it was then buried by half the mountain crumbling into a gigantic rockslide. Peter and Maisie recovered from the impossible and incredible event they just witnessed. Peter picked up Maisie, and together they flew over to see what that meteor really was...

Meanwhile, inside his drop-pod, the Stranger ended his meditation and brought up various data feeds and scans of current events in time and of Neverland, and saw that his landing went exactly as planned. And so, the Stranger then began plotting as to how to best find and defeat his opposite self, the Familiar, who had taken refuge somewhere on or in orbit of Neverland after being defeated in their last encounter...
121111.title: The Stranger Arrives, With a Mission

1211111.content: I then thought to myself "Hmm... now that I'm on Neverland's surface, what shall I do first?" I then brought up various holocomputer windows filled with the results of my planetary scans, until something grabbed my attention. This particular screen showed a boy and a girl coming my way to investigate, and fortunately, I knew both rather well. I proceeded to open the hatch to my drop-pod and climbed out of the rocks above...
1211111.title: Continue from His perspective

12111112.content: Maisie and Peter walked closer swords drawn.
12111112.title: Their Meeting (Maisie or Peter's POV)

choices: Switch to Maisie or Peter's POV
121111121.content: I finished climbing out of the destroyed mountainside to see the sun of Neverland in my eyes, and to feel Peter's sword braced against my throat. I laughed, then said two Peter and Maisie: "Guys, don't you recognize me? Come on, I know we've met before." Peter narrowed his eyes, then challenged:"Prove you're really the Stranger and not some imposter." I laughed again, then said:"Hook's first name is James, he went to Eton, and his father was a nobleman dabbling in the illegal trading of Africans." Maisie, shocked, said:"Okay, it's him. Wait, Hook's dad was a slave trade boss?!"
121111121.title: Some Facts about Hook are revealed

1211111212.content: "I didn't know that....." said Maisie
1211111212.title: Switch to Maisie or Peter's POV

choices: Switch to Maisie or Peter's POV
12111112121.content: I brought my hands together, and my eyes for a moment changed to white. I then broke the silence, asking the two: "So, children, what shall we do now?"
12111112121.title: STUff!

121111121212.content:
Peter thought for a while.
"I don't know." he said.
121111121212.title: Switch to Maisie or Peter's POV

1211112.content: Maisie looked at Peter confused.
1211112.title: Jump back to Peter and Maisie

12111121.content: Peter and Maisie decided to explore of what had happened.
12111121.title: CONTINUE

121112.content: We decide to go to Spain
121112.title: We decide to go to Spain.

info.brief_description: I meet Peter pan and Maisie. I go to the same house Maisie went to in Spain.
info.pretty_title: How I met Peter Pan and Maisie
